docs.title: Home
docs.text:
ROOCS is a project to develop data services in support of the Copernicus Climate Change Service (C3S). ROOCS is providing a collection of tools to provide data-aware processing services of climate projections from CMIP6, CMIP5, CORDEX and ATLAS.

The main focus of the service is to reduce the volumes of data transferred by providing data-reduction processes that can be invoked directly from the C3S Climate Data Store (CDS).

The aim of this website is to provide a set of links to the services and tools provided by ROOCS.

docs.title: 🧊 About the Project
docs.text:
We provide data-aware processing services for climate projections such as CMIP6 global datasets, integrated into the Climate Data Store (CDS).

These services support scalable, efficient access and transformation of large climate datasets, enabling downstream applications and research.

docs.title: 👥 Who’s Involved?
docs.text:
IPSL – Institut Pierre-Simon Laplace

DKRZ – Deutsches Klimarechenzentrum

docs.title: 🤝 Collaborating Organizations
docs.text:
We actively work with several partners and community groups:

  • 🛰️ STFC/CEDA
  • 🌍 ESGF
  • 🌦️ Ouranos
  • 🧠 CRIM
  • 🐍 GeoPython

docs.title: 🚀 Future Development
docs.text: Ongoing developments are driven by STFC/CEDA and DKRZ, focusing on integrating processing services into the ESGF infrastructure.

docs.title: 0.17.2 – 2025-05-08
docs.text:
• Updated tests for Atlas v2.
  • Fixed dashboard for latest bokeh >= 3.7.

docs.title: 0.17.1 – 2025-05-06
docs.text: • Fixed calendar bug for proleptic Gregorian calendar.

docs.title: 0.17.0 – 2025-04-29
docs.text: • Added support for Atlas v2 data.

docs.title: 0.16.1 – 2025-02-26
docs.text:
• Fixed smoke tests.
  • Added beautifulsoup to requirements.

docs.title: 0.16.0 – 2025-02-21
docs.text:
• Switched to pooch for test data management.
  • Modernized Python code and deployment.
  • Removed roocs-utils. Now requires:
  • clisops >= 0.15.0
  • daops >= 0.14.0
  • Replaced linting setup with ruff.
  • Changed default Git branch to main.

docs.title: 0.15.0 – 2024-11-20
docs.text:
• Improved decadal fixes for proleptic Gregorian calendar.
  • Provenance now includes local installation "site" name.
  • Fixed documentation links.

docs.title: 0.14.0 – 2024-10-22
docs.text:
• Added Docker image test step to CI.
  • Updated CI workflows and template:
  • New CODE_OF_CONDUCT.rst
  • Modernized Dockerfile
  • Documented all processes
  • Switched to pyproject.toml with flit-core
  • Adopted src/ layout

docs.title: 0.13.1 – 2024-07-22
docs.text:
• Added process: average over polygon.
  • Updated CDS domain.

docs.title: 0.13.0 – 2024-02-06
docs.text: • Added subsetting support for Atlas v1 datasets.

docs.title: 0.12.2 – 2023-12-08
docs.text: • Fixed time_components for 360-day calendar compatibility.

docs.title: 0.12.1 – 2023-12-04
docs.text:
• Patched fill-value issue via updated clisops.
  • Added smoke test for fill-value handling.

docs.title: 0.12.0 – 2023-11-28
docs.text:
• Added regridding operator from clisops.
  • Added tests and smoke tests for regridding.
  • CI now uses Conda.

docs.title: 0.11.0 – 2023-11-09
docs.text:
• Added weighted average operator and WPS process.
  • Added WPS regridding process (dummy operator).
  • Updated to:
  • pywps 4.6.0
  • clisops and daops with decadal fixes
  • Dropped Python 3.8 support.

docs.title: 0.10.1 – 2023-07-20
docs.text:
• Updated fix application logic.
  • Fixed smoke tests for CMIP5.

docs.title: 0.10.0 – 2023-07-12
docs.text:
• Updated concat operator to optionally apply subsetting and averaging.
  • Applied CMIP6 decadal fixes directly (no ElasticSearch lookup).
  • Updated to clisops 0.10.0.

docs.title: 0.9.3 – 2023-05-16
docs.text:
• Added smoke tests for:
  • c3s-ipcc-atlas
  • c3s-cmip6-decadal
  • Updated roocs config for c3s-ipcc-atlas.

docs.title: 0.9.2 – 2023-02-02
docs.text:
• Updated to roocs-utils with realization dimension support.
  • Updated concat operator.

docs.title: 0.9.1 – 2022-12-14
docs.text: • Patched subset_level_by_values via clisops 0.9.5.

docs.title: 0.9.0 – 2022-09-27
docs.text: • Introduced initial concat operator.

docs.title: 0.8.3 – 2022-09-26
docs.text:
• Updated to clisops 0.9.2.
  • Updated provenance for C4I.

docs.title: 0.8.2 – 2022-05-16
docs.text:
• Updated to:
  • daops 0.8.1
  • clisops 0.9.1
  • Added metadata tests.

docs.title: 0.8.1 – 2022-04-20
docs.text:
• Updated to roocs-utils 0.6.1.
  • Fixed director for new average_time operator.
  • Added smoke tests for:
  • c3s-cmip5
  • c3s-cordex

docs.title: 0.8.0 – 2022-04-14
docs.text:
• Added:
  • average and average_time operators
  • Dashboard updates (for Bokeh 2.4.2)
  • Removed: diff operator
  • Updated to:
  • clisops 0.9.0
  • daops 0.8.0
  • pywps 4.5.2

docs.title: 0.7.0 – 2021-11-08
docs.text:
• Added subset-by-point process.
  • Updated:
  • clisops 0.7.0
  • daops 0.7.0
  • Dashboard and provenance

docs.title: 0.6.2 – 2021-08-11
docs.text:
• Updated:
  • pywps 4.4.5
  • Dashboard
  • Provenance types and IDs

docs.title: 0.6.1 – 2021-06-18
docs.text:
• Added initial dashboard.
  • Updated to clisops 0.6.5.

docs.title: 0.6.0 – 2021-05-20
docs.text:
• Moved catalog functionality to daops.
  • Updated to:
  • roocs-utils 0.4.2
  • clisops 0.6.4
  • daops 0.6.0
  • Added initial usage process.

docs.title: 0.5.0 – 2021-04-01
docs.text:
• Updated:
  • pywps 4.4.2
  • clisops 0.6.3
  • roocs-utils 0.3.0
  • Introduced FileMapper and intake catalog support.

docs.title: 0.4.2 – 2021-03-22
docs.text: • Updated to clisops 0.6.2.

docs.title: 0.4.1 – 2021-03-21
docs.text:
• Switched to pywps 4.4.1 and linked storage.
  • Added:
  • Storm tests (via Locust)
  • Improved smoke tests
  • Cleaned requirements and YAML warnings.
  • Fixed average output behavior.

docs.title: 0.4.0 – 2021-03-04
docs.text:
• Removed unused dependencies.
  • Updated to daops >= 0.5.0.
  • Renamed axes input to dims in wps_average.
  • Fixed test data and added smoke tests.

docs.title: 0.3.1 – 2021-02-24
docs.text: • Pinned cf_xarray < 0.5.0 for compatibility.

docs.title: 0.3.0 – 2021-02-24
docs.text:
• Fixed test data using GitPython.
  • Updated:
  • pywps 4.4.0
  • Provenance structure
  • Subset alignment
  • CI (moved to GitHub Actions)
  • Added director module.
  • Improved CMIP6 support.

docs.title: 0.2.0 – 2020-11-19
docs.text:
• Built on cookiecutter template via cruft.
  • Processes available: subset, orchestrate.
  • Integrated daops, Metalink output, and provenance.

docs.title: 0.1.0 – 2020-04-03
docs.text: • Initial release.

docs.title: Contact
docs.text: If you are interested in finding out more about the project please send an e-mail.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: ROOCS has several components to provide data-aware processing on climate projections.

docs.title: ROOCS components
docs.text:
• rooki - A client for roocs climate data operations service (rook)
  • rook - A Web Processing Service (WPS) for roocs
  • daops - A library for data-aware operations on climate simulation outputs
  • clisops - A library for running data-reduction operations on Xarray
  • dachar - A library used to capture and analyze the character of climate data sets
